comment: The square of the norm is the norm of an inner product in a subcomplex pre-Hilbert space. Equation I4 of [Ponnusamy] p. 362. (Contributed by NM, 1-Feb-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)
